title: About Me
name: Ran Wright
description: I transform complex data challenges into scalable AI solutions that drive business growth. With expertise in AIOps, MLOps, and data architecture, I help organizations harness the power of AI to solve real-world problems and achieve measurable results.
expertise: AI Strategy & Implementation – Developing tailored AI solutions that deliver measurable business value
Data Platform Architecture – Building robust, scalable data infrastructures that power AI-driven insights
MLOps & AIOps – Streamlining AI workflows to accelerate deployment and maximize ROI
Low Latency Systems – Optimizing performance for real-time data processing and decision-making

projects.title: LLM Logic Lab
projects.description: Led research on logical reasoning capabilities of Large Language Models, developing a framework that improved model performance by 40% in complex reasoning tasks.

projects.title: Scaling API Infrastructure
projects.description: Architected and implemented caching strategies for a system handling 1.2 billion daily API requests, reducing latency by 60% while maintaining 99.99% uptime.

philosophy: I believe in delivering AI solutions that directly address business challenges. My approach combines technical excellence with a deep understanding of client needs, ensuring every project delivers measurable value and competitive advantage.
